dict.acceptation: 粗鲁的；简陋的；狂暴的；近乎下流的；

sent.orig: Some people have rude manners and extremly rude language.
sent.trans: 有些人态度粗鲁，说起话来更是粗俗。

sent.orig: He's very rude / a very rude man.
On the other hand, rude people are looked down upon.
sent.trans: 另一方面，无礼的人则遭人轻视。

sent.orig: Nothing can possibly excuse him for such rude behavior.
sent.trans: 他这样粗鲁的行为，无论怎样都不能原谅。

sent.orig: Such rude words won't Bear repeating.
sent.trans: 如此粗野的话不堪重述。
